DOC.brief_summary: A study to compare the conversion to Prograf® (tacrolimus) to the continuation of cyclosporine in patients at risk for chronic renal allograft failure
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Compare the Conversion to Prograf® (Tacrolimus) to the Continuation of Cyclosporine in Patients at Risk for Chronic Renal Allograft Failure
DOC.detailed_description: A two arm study (1 Active, 1 Active control) to compare the incidence, progression and severity of chronic renal allograft failure in at-risk patients who are converted from cyclosporine-based to tacrolimus-based immunosuppression to patients who remain on cyclosporine-based therapy
DOC.criteria: Patient has been on cyclosporinebased immunosuppression regimen since the transplant Patient has at least one predefined risk factor for chronic allograft failure Patient is dialysis dependent Patient is recipient of a solid organ transplant other than the kidney
